title: New: Lyves – Holding Back
content:
Fresh off tour supporting Coldplay, London’s Lyves has released her first new material since her fantastic debut EP.

Holding Back is another immaculate production, merging elements of R&B, electronica and soul with utterly unique and spellbinding consequences. With another track expected before the end of the year, alongside continued work on her first full length release, it’s a welcome return and hopefully the start of plenty more to come. Check out Holding Back below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
